SVGAttributeZoomAndPan.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The zoomAndPan attribute specifies whether the SVG document can be magnified and panned.

remarks.para: Magnification in this context means the effect of a supplemental scale and translate transformation on the outermost SVG document fragment.
Panning represents a translation (i.e., a shift) transformation on an SVG document fragment in response to a user interface action.
